title: A Doctor Says Sorry for Talking About a Singer's Looks
summary: A doctor in London made a video on TikTok talking about singer Troye Sivan's face and how it looks. He pointed out things he thought were 'problems' and suggested ways to fix them with cosmetic treatments. Many fans and people online did not like this because they felt it was mean and not asked for. Troye Sivan wrote about how the video made him feel sad and insecure about his body. The doctor felt bad and said sorry to Troye, deleting the video. He promised to make nicer content in the future. Troye accepted the apology and said there are no hard feelings. This story shows why it's important to be kind and not judge people's looks without permission.

background_read: This story is about a doctor who talked about a singer's appearance online without being asked. It teaches us about kindness and respecting others' feelings. Many people use social media to share opinions, but it's important to think before speaking to avoid hurting someone. Troye Sivan is a famous singer who started young, and he shared his personal struggles to help others understand why such comments can be harmful. The doctor learned from his mistake and apologized, showing that everyone can make things better by being thoughtful.
